body.p: The PHCR result organizer identifies an observation set, contained within the result organizer as a set of result observations. It contains information applicable to all of the contained result observations. It is particularly useful to group a number of tests, such as culture results, that are performed on a common specimen. Note: Where there is a specimen, one can set the specimenRole/id to equal the specimen collection procedure's participantRole[@classCode="SPEC"]/id in order to assert that this observation is being made on the specimen collected in the corresponding specimen collection procedure.
